content.rendered:
Our vase arrangements are curated for flower enthusiasts, offering a modern and stylish aesthetic with a contemporary finish. Each vase arrangement is uniquely designed to highlight the finest seasonal florals available in our studio on the day. Luxurious, elegant, refined.

Inspired by the beauty of each season, featuring premium flowers thoughtfully selected to reflect the season’s finest.

Presented in a contemporary vase and trailing ribbon.

The beauty of nature lies in its diversity, and we embrace this philosophy. All L&R designs are unique and one-of-a-kind. Images provided are for illustrative purposes only. The vase arrangements you receive will depend on the season and availability. Place your trust in us to choose the finest flowers to convey your sentiments.

Size guide ~ Plinth diameter 32cm
Vase size: 20cm x 15cm approx.
Standard option pictured

GST Included. Delivery calculated at checkout.
